title: WHY DOES THIS HAPPEN TO ME (lol idc 1000 losses)

replies.body: why do u care after 2000 games played tho?

Seems to be happening all the time now, people going into games (especially ranked) without a stable connection (#lag/dc) or getting into the loading screen only to be bugsplatted or have the firewall issue. They then go on to blame riot, when it is actually their computer or internet providers. 

I know that feel though, I have had so many 4v5s and 3v5s in the past month.
